description: '''Miguel Zen贸n''' (born December 30, 1976) is a Puerto Rican [[alto saxophonist]], composer, band leader, music producer, and educator. He is a [[Grammy Award]] winner, the recipient of a [[Guggenheim Fellowship]], a [[MacArthur Fellowship]], and a Doris Duke Artist Award.  He also holds an Honorary Doctorate Degree in the Arts from [[Universidad del Sagrado Coraz贸n]]. Zen贸n has released many albums as a band leader and appeared on over 100 recordings as a sideman.
